title: Edge of Night should either lose its MR or its Lethality.
body:
Too much offensive potential for the defensive potential it offers.

No downside to building this item.

replies.body: well fro mallet gives 30 AD compared to edge's 65, and also gives no lethality.  Drinker/maw give high mr low AD, I think 50 on completed item, but no lethality, wits end gives 0 AD, 0 lethality and only attack speed, but also 40MR.  None of these give as high offensive capabilities on a defensive item.  Even merc scim only give AD, not lethality as well.

Better change frozen mallet, wit's end, and hexdrinker/maw since they also have both offensive potential and a lot of defense too.

https://s27.postimg.org/w9v0ry4zn/148394996760638.jpg

They don't have a lot of offensive potential though. 

You must not be looking at Edge of Night properly.

I'd be fine with them removing the MR honestly. AD champions already have a great MR item for them {{item:3156}}. Though I do agree with other people's concerns about it as well...that item shouldn't have a 10 second duration with only a 30 second CD.
The low cd long duration spellshield is the main thing that makes it a bit op
